desc: Our Classic Organic Natural Latex pillows are made with the highest quality 100% Carbon Neutralised Organic Latex. You can choose a standard or low profile pillow. Designed to ease Neck Pain for every kind of sleeper.

layout.text:
Sink into our comfy,
all-natural organic pillows
Our eco-friendly pillows are made with the natural sap of 86 organically grown rubber trees. No toxic foams, no harmful chemicals, 100% biodegradeable.
